name: Cascade - Amazon Adventure
description:
Name: Cascades - An Amazonian Adventure

Team:

Michael Hoffmann (Game Design, Programming)

Kevin Regner (Game Design, Sound)

Christina Tamiris (Game Design, Narrative)

Michael Geidel (Game Design, Artwork)

Omar Ahmed (Artwork)

Software: Unity

Description
Have you ever imagined yourself having an adventure in the Amazon forest? 

Cascade is an action based platformer which is placed in the biggest forest in the world. While you are trying to save animals as a Capuchin monkey, you will be chased by poachers, gold-miners and rainforest loggers over different obstacles. 

Every action has a consequence, you have to think before you act. 

This game focuses on the idea that everything is interconnected: the animals' health, the environmental condition and human well being. 

Cascade has a very colorful aesthetic and with original Amazon Rainforest sounds, you have the feeling of being there.
